item.title: Now I'm working at Tiki
item.description: What I did Project: Sandseel - Platform for Exchange Market Base on Peatio open source Peatio Build Restful APIs (Ruby on Rails, Grape) RubyOnRails Build admin tool Project: Sandseel Util - Platform for Deposit/Withdraw Build Restful APIs (Golang) Golang Build workflow deposit onchain to offchain Build workflow withdraw offchain to onchain Build client SDK, research Cosmos Chain (Validator, IBC, RPC, HD Wallet). Cosmos

item.title: Blockchain with Incognito chain
item.description: Introduction Incognito is a blockchain platform Website: https://incognito.org What I did Project: Incognito chain - Platform for Privacy Blockchain Join coding some feature for Core Incognito chain Project: Blockchain Backend - Platform microservice for Incognito Wallet Convert monolithic architecture to microservice architecture Coding some feature for Shielded/Un-Shielded service Coding some feature for Farming/Pool Provider service Build service for managing validator node Build service for trading token Build SDK Use Golang, Restfull Api Project: Explore incognito chain - Platform for delivery data and storage data

item.title: Professional Job at Tiki
item.description: Introduction Tiki is Marketplace for eCommerce Brands and Seller Website: https://www.tiki.vn What I did I build very much project at Tiki, I will list some project I build Project: Talaria - Platform for Order, Inventory, Shipping, Fulfillment, Checkout Build function test for Talaria Build API restful for Talaria (PHP, Laravel, Falcon) Laravel Build payment gateway (Cybersource, 123pay, Momo, Zalopay, Onepay) Build Restful APIs Maintain and upgrade core structure Support bug technical for another team and customer.

item.title: Job at Zinio
item.description: Introduction Zinio is Digital eMagazines company Website: https://www.zinio.com What I did Project: Zenit - Platform for managing digital magazines as Identity user, subscription, payment, content, etc. Build the API Restful for the system (PHP, Symfony) Symfony Research Search Engine use ElasticSearch Elastic Improve the system’s performance (improve sql query, apply caching) Maintain and ensure that the system is not downtime Testing by Unit test/Function test Write documentation for API.

item.title: First job at Esc
item.description: Introduction Esc Company is small team. I was assigned to develop a website for our customer. Website: https://www.esc.vn What I did Build a website with ASP.NET MVC, Jquery, Ajax, SQL Server jQuery Build a website with TomatoCart opensource (PHP) TomatoCart
